front.title: Authentication and (D)TLS Profile for DNS-over-TLS and DNS-over-DTLS

abstract.t: This document describes how a DNS client can use a domain name to authenticate a DNS server that uses Transport Layer Security (TLS) and Datagram TLS (DTLS). Additionally, it defines (D)TLS profiles for DNS clients and servers implementing DNS-over-TLS and DNS-over- DTLS.
